short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate random Powerball lottery numbers for fun.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate random numbers for the Powerball lottery quickly and easily! 

This extension provides a fun and simple way to pick your Powerball numbers, 

including 5 main numbers (1-69) 
and the Powerball number (1-26).

Disclaimer: 
This tool is for entertainment purposes only and is not affiliated with or guaranteed by the official Powerball lottery.

Try your luck and enjoy the experience!
